title: Kaley Cuoco and Karl Cook have been married for over a year. Here's a timeline of their relationship.
text:
Kaley Cuoco might be a TV darling, but in between filming "The Big Bang Theory" and landing new gigs like "Harley Quinn," the rising superstar made time to find love.

Following her divorce from tennis professional Ryan Sweeting, Cuoco began dating Karl Cook, a professional equestrian and the son of billionaire Scott Cook. The duo has since married and found happiness alongside their several "four-legged kids."

Keep scrolling for a complete timeline of Kaley Cuoco and Karl Cook's relationship.

March 2016: Cuoco hinted at her new relationship

#tbt We absolutely mastered the ways of the #selfiestick 😊🕶☀️🌊 A post shared by Kaley Cuoco (@kaleycuoco) on Mar 31, 2016 at 12:24pm PDT Mar 31, 2016 at 12:24pm PDT

In March 2016, the "Big Bang Theory" star began hinting at her relationship with professional equestrian Karl Cook by posting a series of sweet snaps to Instagram. This would be her first relationship since separating from her husband Ryan Sweeting in the fall of 2015.

In an interview for the cover Cosmopolitan's April issue, Cuoco spoke candidly about love and relationships. "I cannot wait to be in love again," she told the magazine. "I don't feel like I am ready yet which is so different for me. I dive into everything."

Shortly after that interview, Cuoco appeared to confirm her new relationship on Instagram. "This is what happy looks like," she captioned a photo posted on April 9, 2016.

That's what happy looks like 💗 A post shared by Kaley Cuoco (@kaleycuoco) on Apr 8, 2016 at 9:24pm PDT Apr 8, 2016 at 9:24pm PDT

Later that day, she posted another photo with Cook that was captioned, "When bae wins it's a good night for this girl."

When bae wins its a good night for this girl 😍😂👊🏽😎🐴 A post shared by Kaley Cuoco (@kaleycuoco) on Apr 9, 2016 at 6:58pm PDT Apr 9, 2016 at 6:58pm PDT

May 9, 2016: Kaley Cuoco and Ryan Sweeting's divorce is finalized

Kaley Cuoco and Ryan Sweeting started dating in 2013. Kevin Winter/Getty Images for Critics' Choice Television Awards

Although Cuoco and Sweeting had been separated since 2015, their divorce wasn't finalized until May 9, 2016. The actress and her tennis player husband called it quits after 21 months of marriage.

On May 10, 2016, Cuoco said she was 'happier than ever' following her divorce

In an interview with "CBS This Morning," Cuoco admitted that she's "never been happier" after divorcing Ryan Sweeting.

"I'm excited to see what the future holds — but it happened, and now I have to say I'm happier than I've ever been," she explained.

When asked about her budding romance with Karl Cook, Cuoco smiled and said, "He's special."

May 19, 2016: Cuoco and Cook pack on the PDA in a sweet Instagram photo

Finally 😌🦄🐴 A post shared by Kaley Cuoco (@kaleycuoco) on May 19, 2016 at 10:41am PDT May 19, 2016 at 10:41am PDT

While the couple had surely kissed in public long before this May 2016 photo appeared on Cuoco's feed, it was the first time they had been seen engaging in PDA on Instagram. If it wasn't clear before that the two were official, it was now.

July 31, 2016: Cuoco gushed about finally finding someone who shares her passions

Finding someone to share your truest passions with changes everything 🐴🦄💏 💗 A post shared by Kaley Cuoco (@kaleycuoco) on Jul 31, 2016 at 12:53pm PDT Jul 31, 2016 at 12:53pm PDT

Taking kissing selfies to a whole new level, Cuoco shared a photo of herself and Cook stealing a smooch while riding horses together. She captioned the photo, "Finding someone to share your truest passions with changes everything."

Cuoco later joked about finally finding her "horse guy" during an appearance on "The Talk" in September 2016.

On September 29, 2016, the couple made their red carpet debut at the Longines Masters Los Angeles Gala

The couple looked lucky in love during their first red carpet appearance. Emma McIntyre/Getty Images

The couple stepped out in Long Beach, California, for what would be their first of many events together.

February 14, 2017: The couple celebrated their first anniversary

Every day since we've met has been better than Valentines Day ... Happy 1 year my 💖 @mrtankcook 📸cred @kristinlee_photo 💕🐴🦄 A post shared by Kaley Cuoco (@kaleycuoco) on Feb 14, 2017 at 12:41pm PST Feb 14, 2017 at 12:41pm PST

On Valentine's Day, Cuoco marked the couple's one-year anniversary of dating with a sweet Instagram photo of the two kissing while riding horses. "Every day since we've met has been better than Valentines Day," the caption read.

Meanwhile, Cook marked the occasion with a special selfie. "Not only is this Valentine's Day, but this is Kaley and my one year anniversary. So here is the very first kissy-face picture I ever sent my love one year ago," he captioned the photo.

On this day I thought I had to reflect. Not only is this Valentine's Day but this is kaley and my one year anniversary. So here is the very first kissy face picture I ever sent my love one year ago😘😘😘 A post shared by Karl Cook (@mrtankcook) on Feb 14, 2017 at 12:02pm PST Feb 14, 2017 at 12:02pm PST

On August 11, 2017, Cuoco's '8 Simple Rules' costar said she believed Cook could be 'the one'

When asked by "Entertainment Tonight" if she thought Cook could be "the one," Cuoco's friend and former costar Amy Davidson responded "I hope so. I do, yeah."

"She's such an animal lover, advocate. That brings them even closer together," Davidson added.

On November 30, 2017, the couple announced their engagement

Still crying 💍 every part of this night has been perfection just like you @mrtankcook I love you forever! A post shared by Kaley Cuoco (@kaleycuoco) on Nov 30, 2017 at 9:29pm PST Nov 30, 2017 at 9:29pm PST

Cook proposed to Cuoco on her 32nd birthday. In a video shared to Instagram, Cuoco can be seen crying and saying "yes" repeatedly after Cook jokes she didn't officially agree to his proposal. Cook posted the same video with a caption that read, "After nearly two years I finally got up the courage to ask her to marry me. This is the best night of my life."

Earlier that day, he posted a photo of Cuoco with a joke engagement ring while the two were shopping at Target.

On my loves birthday I got her everything she has always wanted....now judging by her face maybe not, it's the thought that counts right😳😳😳 A post shared by Karl Cook (@mrtankcook) on Nov 30, 2017 at 3:57pm PST Nov 30, 2017 at 3:57pm PST

A few weeks later, the couple celebrated their engagement at Disneyland alongside Kaley Cuoco's sister Briana and a group of friends.

On June 30, 2018, Kaley Cuoco married Karl Cook

Happy ever forever 💏 🐶 wearing custom @reemacra in my dream cape and @jenniferbehr in my hair!.. 💫 @claudcraig 📷 A post shared by Kaley Cuoco (@kaleycuoco) on Jul 1, 2018 at 2:00pm PDT Jul 1, 2018 at 2:00pm PDT

Less than a year after Cook's proposal, the couple tied the knot in a San Diego, California, ceremony. Cuoco wore an intricate lace gown to the ceremony and changed into a lace jumpsuit for the reception. On Instagram, she joked that the couple was now "Legally KCSQUARED."

Read more: Kaley Cuoco shared an inside look at her wedding to Karl Cook — and it was beautiful

Immediately after her wedding to Karl Cook, the "Big Bang Theory" star revealed that she underwent shoulder surgery instead of going on a honeymoon.

"When your 'honeymoon' is shoulder surgery and your husband looks just as happy lol on the road to recovery," Cuoco captioned a hospital selfie she shared to Instagram.

When your ‘honeymoon’ is shoulder surgery and your husband looks just as happy lol on the road to recovery - thank you for all the love and support! ❤️ knowing @mrtankcook I’m sure he will be posting tons of hilarious gems 🙄🤪 thank god my hair color is on point (@clarissanya) A post shared by Kaley Cuoco (@kaleycuoco) on Jul 5, 2018 at 12:51pm PDT Jul 5, 2018 at 12:51pm PDT

During a September interview on CBS' "The Late Late Show With James Corden," Cuoco said she relied on Cook to do her hair during that time because she had limited mobility. "He did a lot of top knots in my hair," she said.

December 14, 2018: The couple finally got to go on their honeymoon

The Honeymooners ❄️ ⛄️💑 @mrtankcook A post shared by Kaley Cuoco (@kaleycuoco) on Dec 14, 2018 at 2:29am PST Dec 14, 2018 at 2:29am PST

After nearly six months of marriage, the couple finally went on their honeymoon trip to Switzerland. Cuoco shared plenty of photos of the couple looking cozy in the cold weather.

On June 30, 2019, the two celebrated a year of marriage

Everyone posts wedding pictures amongst other idealized images on their anniversary, not me, these are images of my gorgeous wife I remember😍😍I love you @kaleycuoco A post shared by Karl Cook (@mrtankcook) on Jun 30, 2019 at 8:10am PDT Jun 30, 2019 at 8:10am PDT

One year after their San Diego wedding, the couple posted sweet tributes to each other on Instagram in honor of their anniversary. While Cuoco shared adorable wedding photos, Cook opted for a series of hilarious videos and embarrassing photos of his wife from their time together.
description: "The Big Bang Theory" star Kaley Cuoco was first linked to professional equestrian Karl Cook in March 2016.
